Package com.google.android.exoplayer2.text.dvb

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DvbDecoder
    A SimpleSubtitleDecoder for DVB Subtitles.
    DvbParser
    Parses Cues from a DVB subtitle bitstream.
    DvbParser.ClutDefinition
    CLUT family definition containing the color tables for the three bit depths defined
    DvbParser.DisplayDefinition
    Contains the geometry and active area of the subtitle service.
    DvbParser.ObjectData
    The textual or graphical representation of an object.
    DvbParser.PageComposition
    The page is the definition and arrangement of regions in the screen.
    DvbParser.PageRegion
    A region within a DvbParser.PageComposition.
    DvbParser.RegionComposition
    An area of the page composed of a list of objects and a CLUT.
    DvbParser.RegionObject
    An object within a DvbParser.RegionComposition.
    DvbParser.SubtitleService
    The subtitle service definition.
    DvbSubtitle
    A representation of a DVB subtitle.
